original_title: Chances Are You Just Might Find It
overview: "Chances Are You Just Might Find It" follows an immensely repressed man as he argues with an idealistic young woman. What begins as innocent jesting quickly morphs into a deep philosophical discussion about rage and how it can rule ones life.
tagline: What does someone have to do, to make another that mad?
title: Chances Are You Just Might Find It
